constituent: leak, water, water droplets, water pistol, flag, rain, weather
koohiiStory1: WATER always LEAKED in the spot left by the FLAG planted in the roof everytime it RAINED. Not too hard to picture a hole left in the ceiling from a flag, now leaking water.
koohiiStory2: Mark the holes where rain water can leak through with little flags.
readingExamples: 漏らす (も.らす), 漏る (も.る), 漏れる (も.れる)
words: to leak out, to escape, to come through, to shine through, to filter out, to be omitted
